nettyserver

Class StatDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • nettyserver.StatDAO

  • public class StatDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Status DAO (means Data Access Object) that used to work with DB in all maters related to statistics. Adds request details to DB, reads statistic from DB, etc.

      • inetATON

        public int inetATON(java.lang.String ip)
        Convert IPv4 text string like '127.0.0.1' into a integer value. Analog of INET_ATON function in MySQL.
        Parameters:
        ip - IPv4 String
        Returns:
        Compressed IP adress

        Adds a request details in database
        Parameters:
        ip - Host IP
        uri - URI address
        sent_bytes - Bytes sent
        received_bytes - Bytes received
        speed - Total speed of transferred data
        redirect - redirect URL
